Huntail (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0366: Clamperl
Pokémon
#0368: Gorebyss →

Huntail has been featured on 7 different cards since it debuted in the EX Hidden Legends expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Huntail cards are normally Water-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Huntail

Huntail
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Huntail EX Hidden Legends 19/101 Undone Seal 034/083
Huntail EX Legend Maker 18/92 Mirage Forest 031/086
Huntail Great Encounters 42/106 Dawn Dash  
Huntail Primal Clash 50/160 Tidal Storm 028/070
        M Master Deck Build Box Speed Style   007/049
Huntail Celestial Storm 42/168 Sky-Splitting Charisma 028/096
Huntail Fusion Strike 066/264 Fusion Arts 024/100
Huntail Destined Rivals 055/182 Glory of the Rocket Gang 024/098


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
